column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH:------ A foreign man was found lying dead on the ground floor stairs of a house on St. 13/110 corner
column4: Daun Penh in the early hours of June 5
column5: 2020 110------The unidentified man was described as Caucasian and in his 40s
column6: wearing black shorts and no shirt.------According to sources at the scene
column7: an upstairs resident came downstairs and saw the foreigner lying dead and reported to the local authority.------The source said the death of the foreigner was suspected of being a drug overdose which caused a heart attack.------After the incident
column8: the competent authorities took the victim’s body to be kept at Wat Teuk Thla
column9: waiting for him to be identified.------POST NEWS------Later images (------warning------):
